metadata.title: CVE-2022-44570 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Range header parsing component ofRack >= 1.5.0. A Carefully crafted input can cause the Range header parsingcomponent in Rack to take an unexpected amount of time, possibly resultingin a denial of service attack vector. Any applications that deal with Rangerequests (such as streaming applications, or applications that serve files)may be impacted.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
